comment: A hockey goalie is trying to prevent a goal from the opposing team .
A Father is observing his son , Kurt to see if his teaching prevents Kurt from cutting himself as he shave with a razor for the first time .
Four men in green at a soccer goal post trying to score , while 3 men in blue try to prevent it .
An elderly man enjoys the view under an umbrella to prevent the sun rays .
An infant is laying on a hammock while a hand reaches out to his right leg to prevent him from falling
The blue-uniformed softball player is blocking the bag and trying to prevent the opposing player from touching the base .
A goalie dives to prevent the ball from going into the goal .
A man is holding a bride 's dress up to prevent it from getting dirty on a rain soaked boardwalk .
The back of three people all wearing red vest that say prevention on them .
An woman wearing headphones is sitting on a subway wearing a blue face mask while three men also wearing the masks to prevent germs look back in her direction .
Two boys , surrounded by paper pieces , hold a third boys shirt to prevent him from grabbing a bag .
Smoke has filled the air and the buildings preventing the firefighter from entering the building .
Four men , dressed in white overall suits that prevent infection , are in a room with mechanical equipments and a ladder .
A hockey game with several players playing their part in preventing or facilitating a goal .
A child soccer player jumps for the ball to prevent it from going into the net but , does not successfully accomplish his goal .
Soccer players aggressively playing defense to prevent a score .

At a men 's basketball game , number 55 , in white and yellow , tries desperately to prevent number ten , in black and gray , from making a shot while the rest of the players watch frozen on the court .
